comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
June 13, 1914: Fifth-anniversary reunion of the Class of 1909: Part of the commencement week observance, at Princeton University.

It is interesting to note that the Class of 1911 at Yale University also was costumed as a deck of playing cards, during 1914 Class Day activities in New Haven, Connecticut:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5579689162/]
